name: Rock-A-Bye Chaos
description:
Controls: WASD

Objectives: 

  • Catch the baby at any cost. 
  • Avoid bullets and other hazards.
  • Get hit twice and you'll have to try again :(

Nothing says "Let  there be chaos" more than a baby with a chain gun!!  Assume the role of clueless father and catch this young ruffian  before things get really bad. 

This game contains original art, music, and sound effects. Additional sound effects were sourced from freesound.org.

Art/Programming: Madog_Porter

https://madog-porter.itch.io/

Music/Sound Effects: Heychuall
